note: Kaw/Settler Assistant Professor of Biology at a PWI SLAC. Into hormones, transgenerational effects & Indigenous philosophies of science. Decolonizer. Abolition. Queer genderless they/them. Personal account with professional content. Friendly, fierce, and shy. I also make and sell beadwork, ask me about it :)

fields.name: Autoblock?
fields.value: Only if it's impossible to get a read on who/how you are (no bio, no posts, new account, etc)
